Homepage.content:
Please check out all the modules on top, and if you want to view the other skin press back on your browser and select it. We sure hope you enjoy this wonderful template, we've put a lot of work and effort into it. Also please keep in mind that all content text is fully html editable so you can use whatever style you wish, links, size and colors, embed images or swf inside these text areas and so much more. Also don't forget to check out the powerful CMS Admin bundled with this template, it is a huge time saver and selling point for your clients.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque malesuada imperdiet sem. Nam urna ligula, pellentesque eu, iaculis vitae, tincidunt a, nunc. Sed convallis, risus id congue faucibus, est consequat id, est. Aliquam vehicula, sem dapibus massa lectus pellentesque lacus, et consectetur enim nibh at tellus.

Donec nunc magna, feugiat et, varius ut, semper sed, neque. Aenean semper, lacus eget ullamcorper cursus, velit augue ullamcorper odio, sit amet dictum tortor tellus non ligula. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Sed odio justo, consequat eu, pharetra sed, suscipit a, erat. Curabitur eu felis et ligula sodales consequat. Suspendisse ligula. Morbi neque orci, interdum.

slider.title: Latest Projects
slider.item:
Gallery Item Description (html formatted)
Each photo/video in the gallery can have an extensive description text that is of course html formatted. If the text is longer a scrollbar appears, so no limits here ! The description text is not mandatory, if there is no description text entered, then the window will be nicely resized acordingly to acomodate just the photo/video and it will have equal black margins all around.
